SEARCH
Package com.visionreport.api

Class VisionReport

java.lang.Object
com.visionreport.api.VisionReport
public final class VisionReport extends Object
The central data container for a Vision Report execution.

This class manages test suites, configuration metadata, and report generation. A VisionReport instance collects all tests, system information, and metadata before being rendered into an HTML report via the flush() methods.

Example usage:

 VisionReport report = new VisionReport();

 report.config()
       .setTitle("Vision Report - Regression Suite")
       .setProjectName("Vision Report Framework")
       .setEnvironment("Staging")
       .setTesterName("Deepak")
       .addCustomInfo("Build", "v1.0.0");

 report.createTest("Login Test")
       .assignAuthor("Deepak")
       .assignCategory("Smoke")
       .log(Status.PASS, "Login successful");

 report.flush(); // or report.flush("reports");
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.2
Author:
Deepak

  • Constructor Details

    • VisionReport

      public VisionReport()
      Constructs a new VisionReport instance.

      Initializes the report with default title, empty system info, and empty test list. Use config() to customize metadata and createTest(String) to add tests.

  • Method Details

    • config

      public Config config()
      Returns the configuration interface for setting up report metadata.
      Returns:
      the Config instance for fluent chaining

    • createTest

      public Test createTest(String testName)
      Creates a new test case with an auto-generated ID (e.g., TC-1, TC-2).
      Parameters:
      testName - the name of the test case
      Returns:
      a new Test instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if testName is null or blank

    • createTest

      public Test createTest(String id, String testName)
      Creates a new test case with a custom identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the custom test ID (e.g., "API-001")
      testName - the display name of the test
      Returns:
      a new Test instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if testName is null or blank

    • flush

      public void flush()
      Generates the report in the default folder vision-reports using a timestamped filename.

    • flush

      public void flush(String pathOrFileName)
      Flushes the report to a given directory or full HTML path.
      • If the path ends with .html or .htm, it is treated as a full file path.
      • Otherwise, it is treated as a folder path where a timestamped file will be generated.
      Parameters:
      pathOrFileName - the directory or file path

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns the report title.
      Returns:
      the report title string

    • getSystemInfo

      public List<SystemInfo> getSystemInfo()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of system/environment metadata entries.
      Returns:
      list of SystemInfo objects

    • getTests

      public List<Test> getTests()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of test cases included in this report.
      Returns:
      list of Test objects
